title: 1.30ct Cerrone Diamond Ring
description: Cerrone Diamond ring with 9 marquise cut Natural Diamonds and 16 round Natural Diamonds totalling 1.30ct (Estimated grading: HIJ VS). 18ct yellow and white gold. Ring size P. Band width: 6.3mm - 7.5mm. Weight: 10.1g. With copy of Cerrone Valuation dated 12/11/2025 and Cerrone Box. (Pre-owned).
